game.name: Castle Game
game.description:
Oh my God! This lovely character has got into trouble and he needs a helping hand to get him out. Would you like to help him out and show off the world that you are a kind-hearted person? Join Castle Game and be prepared to protect this cool character from all the dangerous that you see on his way! Keep your eyes on the screen and make sure to keep him away from the reels!

This brand new adventure game has brought to you everything you need to kill your time. Click or tap the screen to make him jump and avoid the obstacles! Do not forget to grab as many yellow coins as possible to make him stronger than before. Track the energy of your character by looking at the top left corner of the screen! You can also know how much coins you have collect as of now by looking next to the power bar.

The castle background, light music and fabulous graphics will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for long. Put your skill and physics abilities to the test in this HTML5 jumping game! You are not going to be bored for a single minute when you stick to it. Make sure to give it some time to understand the complete gameplay. If you are finding it difficult to pass your free time, do not forget to browse through our extensive variety of free adventure games.
